title: A Farmer's Daily Routine
text: Resource allocation in large-scale farming. In the morning, I wake up early and walk to the fields. Telemetry from precision agriculture guides irrigation decisions. Maintenance avoids breakdowns during harvest. Irrigation is scheduled to reduce water waste. We record yields and monitor feed intake. I talk to the team and assign tasks for the afternoon. The sun is low, and the soil is cool and soft. I work on Green Valley Farm, and every day is busy. I clean the barn after milking and store the tools. The tractor starts slowly; I drive carefully on the farm road.
